skills.name: Strafe
skills.description: Rapidly fires 2 shots, and may fire an additional shot by chance. The chance of firing an additional shot is equivalent to your Critical Rate. Each attack has a 30% chance to disturb the enemy's HP recovery by 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Arrow Storm
skills.description: Attacks 4 random targets. Each attack has a 50% chance to deal Continuous Damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Path of the Forest
skills.description: Increases the Attack Speed and Critical Rate of all allies for 3 turns.
